test_scenarios.name: Homepage Loads Successfully
test_scenarios.expected_result: Target.com homepage loads completely without errors. Main navigation elements are visible and functional.

test_scenarios.name: Search and View a Product
steps: Enter a valid product name (e.g., 't-shirt') in the search bar.
Click the search icon or press Enter.
Click on a product from the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results are displayed correctly. Product details page loads successfully with product information (name, price, images) displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Add Product to Cart and Initiate Checkout
steps: From a product details page, select a valid size and color (if applicable).
Click on 'View Cart & Checkout' button/link after item is added to cart (or navigate directly to the cart).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Product is added to the cart successfully.  User is directed to the cart page or cart summary is displayed correctly. 'Checkout' button is visible and functional.
